/******************************************/
 * Thrift Library with PHP 5.3 Namespaces *
/******************************************/

I have rewrite the Thrift PHP Generator to have a real Symfony 2 Namespace
compliant code.

Symfony 2 use UniversalClassLoader:
https://github.com/symfony/symfony/tree/master/src/Symfony/Component/ClassLoader


And now, to use it with Symfony 2:

- Add to deps:
    [Thrift]
        git=git@github.com:ebuzzing/thrift.git
        target=/apache-thrift
        version=origin/0.8.x

- Add to app/autoload.php
    $loader->registerNamespaces(array(
        ...
        'Thrift'           => __DIR__.'/../vendor/apache-thrift/lib/phpsf2/src',
    ));

That's it !
